bio: In Windhelm's frigid realm, Karbin Gralle, an Alligator warrior, arose with an unwavering desire – to be Skyrim's greatest warrior. Mastering one-handed weapons and heavy armor, his journey plunged him into the freezing currents of the White River. Confronting his fear of the numbing cold, he swam across its icy depths, emerging as a warrior undeterred by Skyrim's chilling embrace.
name: Karbin Gralle
